name: InfluenzaTestsForInfluenzaAVirusAntigen
title: Influenza (Tests for influenza A virus Antigen)
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for test names to detect Influenza A virus antigen),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify laboratory tests names),(Inclusion Criteria: VSAC query: Influenza virus A Ag;  

LOINC search: 'influenza A virus Ag -B -C -equine -porcine -isolate -swine'),(Exclusion Criteria: panel or interpretation tests, equine or porcine tests)
